alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 1:42AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN ALACHUA...NORTHWESTERN MARION AND WEST CENTRAL PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 230 AM EDT... At 141 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Williston Municipal Airport, or over Williston, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts near 40 to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Ocala, Melrose, Citra, Hawthorne, Archer, University Of Florida, Sparr, Anthony, and Rochelle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam
